title: Heroes Music Pack - Volume 1
description: 9 loopable themes, 6 loopable variations, 6 sets of stems and some extras of HERO-themed audio delights!
longDescription:
Perfect for anything requiring a HEROIC feel, a combination of both orchestra and modern synths suitable for many uses and styles. Featuring epic brass themes and orchestral flourishes, this pack is perfect for anything from modern superhero-style action to old-school whip-cracking adventure. Each theme is loopable, there are variations of some and stems of others plus a selection of uppers and downers.


*** This pack is also included in the Mighty MUSIC MEGA PACK - Volume 1 along with eleven other albums and assorted goodies at an amazing discounted price. Click HERE to check it out! ***


Please feel free to let me know about your project if it features my music so I can share and promote your game.


The Heroes Music Pack - Volume 1 by Ethan Lewis Maltby is a varied selection of heroic themes. With plenty of epic scale and excitement in a variety of styles. Each two minute plus theme can be used in-game or as menu music. There are alternate variations of some themes as well as broken down loopable stems for in-game adaptive experimentation; mix and match each loop to create your own unique soundtrack!


HEROES MUSIC PACK - Overview

- NINE main full tracks of varied themes: LISTEN HERE

- SIX sets of stems which can be used for creating an adaptive score. LISTEN HERE


MAIN THEMES

1 - A Race Against Time - [02:10] + 2 Variations

2 - A Dark Night - [02:30] + 2 Variations

3 - The Hunter - [02:15] + 2 Variations

4 - Drive for Power - [02:24] + 3 Stems & End Sting

5 - Snake Hater - [02:16] + 3 Stems & End Sting

6 - The Steel Man - [02:33] + 3 Stems & End Sting

7 - Onward! - [02:17] + 3 Stems & End Sting

8 - A Super Man - [02:29] + 3 Stems & End Sting

9 - Why is there no rum? - [02:13] + 3 Stems & End Sting
technicalDetails:
Features:

- Fully Mastered, loopable themes ready for import - 21 Minutes

- SIX sets of stems and Ending stings for in-game flexibility

- TWO sets of variations for three of the themes for no hassle in-game adaptive use - 13 Minutes

- Professional Quality wav files, 16bit/44.1khz

- Composed and Produced by a musician with two decades of professional experience in Film, TV, Sporting Events and Theatre.


Number of Audio Wavs: 53

Number of Audio Cues: 53

Sample rate / bit rate: 16bit/44.1khz

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 42:27

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Additional Notes:

Please do let me know if you use my work on any of your games so I can share and promote.

For any questions, enquiries or if you are interested in collaborations or commissions, please feel free to contact me and for more information about my work, please visit my website.
